attributes.action: honour his election pledge to give the British people the right to vote on the Lisbon Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the Prime Minister is correct that the Lisbon Treaty is not simply a Euro Constituion in disguise, he has nothing to fear from giving the British public the opportunity to vote on whether they wish it to be ratified.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
